findings.title: Use .transfer instead of .send
findings.description: This is a very minor issue because .send is still valid, but .transfer has a richer interface and allows you to override the gas limit, which .send does not.

findings.title: Avoid magic number.
findings.description: We recommend avoiding the use of magic numbers, using a variable here would improve readability and make the code more maintainable for the future.

findings.title: Make visibility explicitly declared on functions
findings.description: Functions do not have explicit visibility declarations.

findings.title: Use explicit types for variables
findings.description: It is best practice to explicitly define your types. For example you should specify `uint256` instead of `uint`.

findings.title: Using require is recommended over throw
findings.description: It is best practice to use `require(somethingHappened)` instead of `if (!somethingHappened) throw`

findings.title: Typo in function name setEarlyParicipantWhitelist
findings.description: There is a typo in the function name setEarlyParicipantWhitelist.

findings.title: CrowdsaleBase has no Solidity version specified
findings.description: You should always specify the version of Solidity that should be used for compiling.

findings.title: Old versions of Solidity used
findings.description: It is recommended to use a consistent version of Solidity for each contract, and to use the latest stable version. Version 0.4.6, 0.4.8, 0.4.12 are being used

findings.title: Many Tokens with Minimum Amount Check
findings.description: The function has multiple tokens but also checks if the amount is above a minimum, which may be intentional or a mistake.
